700999f-a.title: Bronx: Edison Avenue - Dewey Avenue
700999f-a.text:
Edison Avenue, north from Dewey to Schley Avenues. In the
background, and partially obstructing the course of the avenue,
is the J. D. Wolfe Mansion.
About 1923
Joseph P. Day
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS
700999f-a.folder: Edison Avenue & Dewey Avenue, Bronx, NY

700865f-a.title: Bronx: Dewey Avenue - Edison Avenue
700865f-a.text:
Dewey Ave. (school and church facing thereon), east from Edison
to Loga: Aves. On the north side of the street is Public School
No. 72, and on the smuth side is the Fort Schuyler Presbyterian
Community Church. Running from right to left, in front of the church,
is East 177th street. The view is northeastward from East Treront Ave.
May 19, 1938.
P. 1  L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700865f-a.folder: Dewey Avenue & Edison Avenue, Bronx, NY

700864f.title: Bronx: Dewey Avenue - Edison Avenue
700864f.text:
Dewey Ave. (not seen), north side, east from Edison to Logan Aves.,
showing the playground and rear of Public School No. 72 as viewed south-
ward along Edison Ave.
1932.
Board of Education, City of New York.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.

700863f-a.title: Bronx: Dewey Avenue - Edison Avenue
700863f-a.text:
Dewey Ave., north side, east from Edison to Logan Aves., showing
Public School No. 72.
1932.
Board of Education of the City of New York.
